com.authlete.jaxrs.api

Class AuthleteApiImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.authlete.jaxrs.api.AuthleteApiImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.authlete.common.api.AuthleteApi

    public class AuthleteApiImpl
extends Object
implements com.authlete.common.api.AuthleteApi
    The implementation of AuthleteApi using JAX-RS 2.0 client API.
    Author:
    Takahiko Kawasaki
